name: A Battle Gunship Space War: Helicopter in Action
name_original: A Battle Gunship Space War: Helicopter in Action
description:
This is the most exciting space game of the helicopter. Just control the helicopter to dodge enemy and try to maintain energy to fly as long as possible. There are items to collect as a weapon to attack the enemy. How long can you fly? Come test your capability, speed and reaction!!!

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the helicopter to dodge enemy
- Maintain energy to fly as long as possible
- Collect items to increase your abilities.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Beautiful helicopter and scenes
- Exciting sounds and effects
- Upgrade character
